price: Na msichana aliye zikwa hai atapo ulizwa!
footnotes: Na mtoto wa kike aliye zikwa hai, akaulizwa kwa kumliwaza yeye, na kumshutumu aliye mzika hai,

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
